qas.question: What year did the sixth season of American Idol first air?

How many overall viewers did the first show of the season generate?

context: Season six began on Tuesday, <a2_0>January 16, <a0_0>2007<a2_0/><a0_0/>. The premiere drew a massive audience of <a1_0><a3_0>37.3 million<a3_0/><a1_0/> viewers, peaking in the last half hour with more than 41 million viewers.
